lowcode.pageGenrator.text: You can generate new pages for any entity defined in your GraphQL schema. By Clicking Generate Page button in Floating Action Button you can select one or multiple entities from the list.
lowcode.template.text: Component Templates (Component library can be used at runtime, possible to choose between no-code, low-code or classic development approach.)
lowcode.addField.text: Selecting Add Field from Floating Action Button you can choose one or multiple fields to be added to your generated page.
lowcode.WYSIWYG.text: Wysiwyg allows you to edit your web application. By hovering on HTML elements on the page Wysiwyg draws a bounding box (Tippy) around the element with component name and Edit button.
lowcode.hasuraPostgresPostGIS.text: By clicking GraphQL icon in Floating Action Button, you can specify your GraphQL endpoint URL. After saving, schema that describes hierarchy of types with fields is automatically fetched from the specified GraphQL server.
lowcode.translate.text: Your site can contain multiple json files for different langugages.
lowcode.theme.text: Using Theme Editor feature from Floating Action Button, you can modify the visual aspect of your application.
lowcode.ERD.text: Your site can contain multiple json files for different langugages.
